172 
 
COURSE/DEGREE AWARDING 
INSTITUTIONS  
DIRECT ENTRY  UTME  UTME SUBJECTS  SPECIAL CONSIDERATION (WAIVER) REMARKS  
ABSU             
  
  
 VISUALAND APPLIED  ARTS  
FED-NDUFU   
   a) three (3) GCE 'A’ level passes in Fine Arts or 
Technical Drawing plus the UTME 
requirements.  
b) HND holders with an average of B grade with 
the UTME requirements into 300 level.  
c) ND credit or NCEmerit with the UTME 
requirements.  
d) candidates would be interviewed  
(v) NDU requires a pass in Literature in English at the 'A' 
level GCE, or HSC or merit NCE, and in other Arts 
subject, Fine and Industrial Arts or Theatre Arts.  
  
UTME  
(i) ABSU accepts   
a) 'O' levelcredit pass in English Language 
provided Fine Art grade is not below B3.  
b) 'O' levelcredit passes in Mathematics and any 
three (3) subjects from Arts, Social Sciences 
and Sciences  
(ii) BENIN accepts five (5)'O' level credit passes to 
include English Language and one (1) Arts subject. 
It also accepts candidates without Fine Arts at ‘O’ 
level.  
(iii) FED-LAFIA requiresfive (5) 'O' level credit passes in 
English Language, Mathematics, Literature in 
English and any other relevant subjects.  
(iv) LAGOS accepts  
a) for Theatre Arts, five (5) 'O' level credit passes 
in English Language, Literature in English, 
Mathematics and any other two (2) subjects 
one of which must be an Arts subject.  
b) for Music, five (5) 'O' levelcredit passes in  
 English  Language,  Mathematics,  
Music/Literature inEnglish and any other two
